name: S3 Organization Canvas
attribution:
The S3 Organization Canvas by Bernhard Bockelbrink is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License. 
Changes have been made to fit the space and purpose. More information on the S3 canvas series, and versions for printing the canvas in various formats, can be found at http://s3canvas.sociocracy30.org

sections.title: Unique Value Proposition
sections.instructions:
• What is the one thing that makes your organization unique? 
  • Explain what will convince your customers and your partners to choose your organization over others.

sections.title: Key Drivers
sections.instructions: • What are the top three drivers your organization responds to?

sections.title: Key Deliverables
sections.instructions:
• What does your organization provide to meet the key drivers? 
  • Describe the top three.

sections.title: Customer Segment
sections.instructions:
• Who will be your ideal customers? 
  • These should relate to the actors mentioned in your key drivers.

sections.title: Key Challenges
sections.instructions:
• What are important constraints or risks your organization is facing? 
  • Look to your key drivers, customer segment and unique value proposition to identify them.

sections.title: Key Partners
sections.instructions:
• Who can provide essential support, services or materials to your organization? 
  • What might you outsource or buy?

sections.title: Key Resources and Skills
sections.instructions:
• What does your organization need to sustain itself and create value for the customer? 
  • What skills do you need to create the key deliverables?

sections.title: Channels
sections.instructions:
• How does your organization deliver its value proposition to its customers? 
  • How do customers find out about your organization?

sections.title: Key Metrics
sections.instructions:
• How will you measure effectiveness of your response to your key drivers? 
  • Prefer simple, continuous and actionable metrics.

sections.title: Key Values
sections.instructions:
• Describe the culture of your collaboration, and how you will interact with the rest of the world. 
  • List three guidelines for behavior and/or ethical constraints you consider essential to the success of your organization.

sections.title: Cost Structure
sections.instructions: • What are fixed and running costs for your organization?

sections.title: Revenue Streams
sections.instructions: • How will you start and sustain your organization financially?
